channel.title: git on Ramana: TIL
channel.description: Recent content in git on Ramana: TIL

item.title: Delete older git branches
item.description: Every few months, I find myself finding the command to delete all my old branches. To the future me, for k in $(git branch | sed /\*/d); do if [ -z "$(git log -1 --since='1 week ago' -s $k)" ]; then git branch -D $k fi done
